projects.title: Sound Design, Music, and Scripting
projects.description: For this project I helped with ideation, composed music, created sound effects, and used Unity to develop the scripts for those sound systems. Click the button below for the blog post on it!

projects.title: Generative Music Application!
projects.description: This was a complete project that was solo designed & developed. Everything was designed to be simple and approachable to users, and this we evaluated through multiples feedback interviews. Click the button below for the blog post on it!
